Review_Title: Wholesome and Entertaining - Fun for Families with Kids

Author: chenp-54708
Review_Title: Cool Title But That's The Only Thing That is Good About This Film
Review: Saw this back at the 2023 Sundance Film Festival.

Author: abounds-09729
Review: I thoroughly enjoyed this film, not expecting the gut-punch it provided. The two leads, Jacob Buster as Calvin and Emma Tremblay as Itsy, provided outstanding performances. They were adorable, even though they both played outcasts. (Lesson: It's okay to be different. You don't have to change so you can belong to a certain group.)
